content: दक्षिणा {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} On the right or south of. {@--2@} In the southern direction (with <ab>abl.</ab>). --णा {@--1@} A present or gift to Brāhmaṇas (at the completion of a religious rite, such as a sacrifice). {@--2@} Dakṣiṇā regarded as a daughter of Prajāpati and as the wife of Sacrifice personified; पत्नी सुदक्षिणेत्यासीदध्वरस्येव दक्षिणा <ls>R. 1. 31.</ls> {@--3@} A gift, offering or donation in general, fee, remuneration; प्राणदक्षिणा, गुरुदक्षिणा &c. {@--4@} A good milch-cow, prolific cow. {@--5@} The south. {@--6@} The southern country, the Deccan. {@--7@} Fame. {@--8@} A kind of heroine thus defined: --या गौरवं भयं प्रेम सद्भायं पूर्वनयिके . न मुंचत्यन्यसक्तापि सा ज्ञेया दक्षिणा बुधैः ... {@--9@} Completion of any rite.
